input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Latitude Run 8' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Easy Set-Up Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Red Barrel Studio 7.5' Tall Unlit Snow Flocked Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches'
  - Name='Puleo International Pine White Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ashland Decor Mini Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions Perry Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 2' Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Homcom Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Charlton Home 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Medium McKenzie Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Mini Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pencil Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Premium Hinged Artificial Christmas Pine Tree w Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 2''
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch Washington Frasier Fir Slim Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Duxbury Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 22" Flocked Pine Full Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='White Unlit Regular Full Hinged PVC Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Stand'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Carmel Pine Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6 ft. Grass Green Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree with 1000 Branch Tips and Metal Stand'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Latitude Run 8' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Douglas Fir type tree but slim silhouette vs. the full body Dunhill Fir, unlit which differs from pre-lit feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Easy Set-Up Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine tree vs. fir and noted for easy set-up but lacks details on branch fullness or pre-strung lights; generally related but different variety and possibly less full.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Red Barrel Studio 7.5' Tall Unlit Snow Flocked Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine tree with snow flocking and unlit; less relevant due to different species, unlit status and additional flocking altering appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Pine White Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine variety with white coloration; white differs from green fir, and no indication of pre-lit or hinged branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland Decor Mini Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mini tree implies very different size and probably less full; no detail on type or features aligning with full fir tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions Perry Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: From same brand but different model likely with differing features or fullness; relevance moderate based on brand and category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 2' Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very small tree (2 feet) unlike the 6-foot Dunhill Fir; less relevant due to size and probable fullness difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Homcom Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim shape and unlit with snow flocking reduces relevance to full-bodied, pre-lit Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but different model likely; probably an artificial fir but unsure of structure and fullness compared to Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same tree model and name with clear lights, very close match to the reference product; likely identical or near identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree but slim and unlit differs from full-bodied, pre-lit Dunhill Fir; same species increases relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Medium McKenzie Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree but medium sized and non-specified fullness; likely similar but less detail on features reduces relevance slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species, slim and unlit; less relevant than full, pre-lit Dunhill Fir but related category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Mini Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mini and pine tree, smaller and different species, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pencil Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil shape differs from full body tree; unlit and likely slim, lowers relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Fir similar to Dunhill Fir; likely full-bodied but no mention of pre-lit or hinged branches lowers relevance slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same product name and brand indicating the identical product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Hinged Artificial Christmas Pine Tree w Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hinged branches and pine tree with tips fits some features but pine species is different from fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 2'
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dunhill Fir but only 2 feet tall versus 6 feet reference reduces relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch Washington Frasier Fir Slim Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species but slim and unlit, and a different fir type; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 22" Flocked Pine Full Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small (22") size and pine species with flocking reduce relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: White Unlit Regular Full Hinged PVC Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full size with hinged branches and metal stand similar features, but white color and no species specified; unlit also. Moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Carmel Pine Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim and pine species with less detail, less relevant to full-bodied fir tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Grass Green Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree with 1000 Branch Tips and Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 feet with many branch tips and metal stand aligns well in size and fullness but unlit and no species specified; fairly high relevance.
